TopicTitle: Any habitat mods? Rings, toruses, toroids ?

Articles.Content: Porkjet habitat pack is not supported for 1.0.2, and i couldn't find any similar works.
Roverdudes MKS/OKS has a habitat ring.
Well it's part of much bigger mod, and i would like something more standalone. I will try to delete the rest of the parts and check if it works though.
Porkjet's habitat pack works fine for 1.0.2 according to everyone on that thread. I haven't launched one yet, but it works fine in the VAB on my game too. It's even on ckan I think.

Porkjet's pack just needs to have it's config files tweaked for 1.0, and I believe someone posted those tweaks in the thread. Be wary, though; the centrifuge *might* need to have it's crew restriction module removed entirely from the config otherwise it won't let crew inside even when it's inflated.
